item.name: _Compendium Version Info
item.text: Includes: Custom Spells, Monsters, Classes/Subclasses, Items from Homebrew Campaign

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

feature.name: Thunderous Touch
feature.text: You can channel lightning through your hands.

feature.name: Wind Step
feature.text: You can move an extra 10 feet when taking the Dash action.

monster.name: Crystal Golem
monster.languages: Understands creator's language but cannot speak

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the golem remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a large crystal formation.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster. Spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks.

monster.spells: Mage Hand, Magic Missile, Shield, Misty Step

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
